dict.string: • The Power Menu can be invoked via an Activator gesture or it can replace the stock power down screen.

• The three buttons on the bottom of the Power Menu, allow you to choose: -Silent Mode (no ringer, no vibration, & lowest volume), -Vibration Mode (just vibration), or -Sound Mode (both ringer and vibration).
• Swipe left or right in the dim area around the Power Menu to show alternate options, such as Respring & Reboot buttons.
• Tap anywhere in the dim area around the Power Menu to dismiss it.
